channel.title: Stream Movies like a Hacker
channel.description: Hey! A very quick little tutorial here, (really not advanced at all), but may save you a tonne of time. *Big scary disclaimer: I don't advise pirating blah blah, I cannot be held responsible for the billions of dollars of "theft" you do with this. Blah Blah. Don't sue me.* Here's the deal - You're a "hacker", you want to look really cool, and you want to watch a movie or TV Show ASAP. You can stream torrents extremely easily without ever leaving the terminal or paying for a damn Netflix/amazon prime subscription. Oh. And without getting your machine taken over by those pesky randsomwarez (Popcorn time though). ## Step 1 - Install - Peerflix - https://www.npmjs.com/package/peerflix - Pirate-get https://github.com/vikstrous/pirate-get - Mpv (Repos) (Install those) ## Step 2 - Rejoice ```bash pirate-get -C "peerflix %s --mpv" moviename ``` Here is a demo. (The mpv window will open with the movie playing), this whole process takes less than 10 seconds to get a working movie. [](https://asciinema.org/a/2gmwduje1kpd5qrh9hxoucpx5)

item.title: Stream Movies like a Hacker
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
Install them… I believe peerflix is nodejs, so install nodejs and install it, and pirate-get is python, so install that with python. mpv is a package in your package manager. Google it! If you’re really struggling, join the IRC.

Read full topic

item.description:
tried it , liked it a lot. Still not using it tho, because of the subtitles i would have to download separate.
Could just use pirate-get without peerflix, but after the downfall of torrent sites, i migrated to https://1337x.to/ , which i find very minimalistic, and easy to use.

Ay, nice! Much better than using the google dorks way. Heres the search term for research purposes.

Name of Movie -inurl:(htm|html|php|pls|txt) intitle: index.of “last modified” (mp4|wma|aac|avi)

item.title: Stream Movies like a Hacker
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
Hey! A very quick little tutorial here, (really not advanced at all), but may save you a tonne of time.

Big scary disclaimer: I don’t advise pirating blah blah, I cannot be held responsible for the billions of dollars of “theft” you do with this. Blah Blah. Don’t sue me.

Here’s the deal - You’re a “hacker”, you want to look really cool, and you want to watch a movie or TV Show ASAP. You can stream torrents extremely easily without ever leaving the terminal or paying for a damn Netflix/amazon prime subscription. Oh. And without getting your machine taken over by those pesky randsomwarez (Popcorn time though).

Step 1 - Install

  • Peerflix - https://www.npmjs.com/package/peerflix
  • Pirate-get https://github.com/vikstrous/pirate-get
  • Mpv (Repos)

(Install those)

Step 2 - Rejoice

pirate-get -C "peerflix %s --mpv" moviename

Here is a demo. (The mpv window will open with the movie playing), this whole process takes less than 10 seconds to get a working movie.

Read full topic
